title: Liz Truss – 2020 Speech on Fairness (Before Redactions)
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Liz Truss, the Secretary of State for International Trade, on 17 December 2020. The Government then reissued this speech with redactions.
content:
No matter your skin colour, sexuality, religion or anything else, the United Kingdom is one of the best places in the world to live.
